title: Black screen doesnt turn on
content: I have tried every possible step I saw in the listed problems to fix the black screen but nothing works so far the screen remains black and doesn't respond to any thing even I tried bootlooping but I can't do that coz it doesn't show up anything after pressing the buttons ..I have chgrd the phone for 1 hr and still tried to on.but it wont turn on neither it vibrates nor show up ...plz solve my problem
